Technical

Beyond studio production and post-production, I work with interactive audio systems and live sound environments. My focus lies in signal flow, middleware logic and real-world console workflows — approaching technical systems with structure and precision.

Game Audio & Middleware

Certified in Wwise, with hands-on experience implementing interactive systems including states, switches, RTPCs and dynamic music logic.

  • Interactive implementation projects (Wwise learning path)
  • Event-driven audio systems
  • Dynamic transitions and parameter control

Live & Console Systems

Trained in professional live environments with practical experience in signal routing, console workflow and stage systems.

  • DiGiCo SD Series certification
  • Midas console certification
  • Practical training at Sala Salamandra (SSL desk)
  • Signal flow, patching and routing
